reviewText: DVD was unplayable box was severely damaged
AC/DC for under 3 bucks what more could you want, there isn't much you could ask for besides the band in your place playing for you.
I've seen Live in Madrid on Youtube but it lacked that high quality luster. This DVD is full quality gold!

When I first came across this DVD I was unsure if I was going to buy it, but as an AC/DC fan this is a must have copy! When I first put this DVD in I was thrilled already with the song "Dirty Deeds Done Dirt Cheap" playing in the main menu options. The show looks incredible, with amazing image and sound quality. Once again, if you're an AC/DC fan or just know them, this is a must have DVD for anyone.
it seems to me that Brian Johnson's voice gets worse and worse with every release. but if you love his voice better than Bon's, youll love this. i gave it three stars because of the band.
The sound quality on this DVD was quite underwhelming.  I was more moved by the live recordings found on Youtube :(

This DVD was amazing, I don't know about the reviewer below complaining about the quality but it looked pretty good to me. Granted it wasn't the best quality in the world but maybe that's the best they could get it. If it looks better than the previous release of this concert then I say that's pretty damn good.
ADCD has released a very poor quality (sound and video) "directors cut" that fades in and out- sound-wise. For true hardcore fans this is "dirty deeds done cheap"! Angus you should recall this DVD!
This DVD is Awesome with all the best Hits, in DOLBY DIGITAL 5.1 Sound, And all the Songs were performed live A++
